1.title: Turbo
1.description: A subscriber of Twitch's monthly premium user service

message.body: layer 2 and a coin snake is the new theme for this stream apparently
what if you time it better
have you tried doing the thing?
it looked like the coin snake was going back down with layer 2
i think i ghit see something
don't know how the i moved 2 spaces
consider not going blind, doesn't sound like a good idea
not quite what i meant but
wait nvm i'm just stupid i think
i should open the rom and just try it
ok i think i see it
so just timing it better but in a different way than i was thinking originally
clearly it means you should clip that slope
do all those moons have any meaning or are they just existing
well that's a thing they do i guess
is he flipping the direction every frame while you scroll?
can you display the direction of the sprite
i guess the sprite would update it's gfx?
so hf having fun with the end?
i can imagine... that hack is full of asm
it doesnt make it bad, just makes it weird
i mean, still havent played that hack for more than 2 hours... i'm gonna do it for sure, and i want to slash that cape section
but after i finish my hack... i'm almost done with level design stuff
is that the first midpoint of the game
also, you might want to put the coinsnake one lower
there's also spinning turn blocks on layer 2 up there
do the natural numbers after 7 work any differently?
hf has yet to count past 8
i assume left path just shows you the top half of layer 1 and isn't actually helpful?
and left path 2 requires the double jump to be beaten.
you might be able to clip layer 2 past the coin snake with the block but timing all that seems like a challenge
i meant stand on the block so layer 2 falls faster
thought it didn't but nvm then
it's just 2 blocks right? if you stand on the block layer 2 will be 2 tiles higher
look I don't play this game
i checked the code again: it checks every frame except for the frame that it places a block
so the exact opposite of what's useful
i think we just came to the same conclusion
why would it display the timer like that
this seems like something you'd require in a pit hack
i mean, what else would you be requiring
so instead we learn something about the coin snake
whether or not we wanted that knowledge is another story
though that does probably break a few puzzles that build on dir coin length so that's quite unfortunate
something for dacin to show off
I'm sure struggelz will be happy about that
and is now sad, yeah i can see that
it's ok dacin you can release all the unreleased videos with this glitch now at least
run up the wall but better i guess
I complained that getting 1 extra coin was not used in Kruela 2.
i definitely didn't know about it until just now
i assume you can't run up layer 2?
@TheBiob struggles already hates me for doing something like that with a p-balloon.
i looked it up and you'll be upset
you just walk up the triangle
and the normal coins and then it works
how do you go from 99 to 40
guess it really was that many
clearly it's an ↑ pointing at a certain cloud block.
is it actually different or an off by one?
and it's a mechanic used in armageddon.
I'll probably stream again soon-ish maybe and I'll have to play armageddon then
i mean shells become carriable when you bounce on them, and you can't immediately bounce off of carriable shells
I'd guess maybe big hitbox but what do i know
but you can't jump off of dead banzais either
you can re-midair a shell like at 1:00 here https://twitter.com/MarkAlarmTV/status/1461741044026933254 (loud volume)
oh this glitch, gc7 coined this the "quantum jump" bc the shell is both dead and alive
i know it works with lava at least
i figured the banzai bill didn't rely on the despawn frame
still think it's probably to do with the big hitbox
i've done it far above the screen border
ok so I wanted to look into it and the first thing in the sprite main ptr table I see is "BanzaiBnCGrayPlat" and now I don't want to anymore
ok I think it's just the fact that it has the "Don't disable clipping when killed by star" flag
presumably due to the size which can't be handled by the default death routine
i don't think it has anything to do with the frame it despawns
ok well maybe i should actually confirm what I'm thinking first
i swear i've collided with a banzai bill after it died but before it went offscreen before
observation 1: you do not interact with dead banzai bills https://cdn.discordapp.com/attachments/404607916147212288/1060308583637602364/image.png
thanks, I had to remake the level 3 times because I kept copying a level that didn't have mario visible because lol oam
oh right, I'm just stupid and opened the level header instead of the sprite header ÿ
I like how HF gets stuck on the same stupid obstacles as I did.
asm nobody needs: whenever the music speeds up, all sprites speed up too.
ok so late observation 2: it is exactly what i thought was going on except not exactly
what the banzai bills main routine does is: draw gfx -> if 14C8 == 2, return otherwise run suboffscreen, upfsyr movement and run interaction
now what I thought was going on is that the first routine calls the suboffscreen routine which sets 14C8 to 0
however it turns out that that routine is just gfx and that's not what's going on because the suboffscreen is called after the 14C8 == 2 check
however, smw already handles suboffscreen during the dead state using another suboffscreen routine berfore calling the main routine if the tweaker bit is set
and that threw me off, but other than that it's exactly what I thought was the reason
the 'if the tweaker bit is set' part only refers to the 'call the main routine after' part of the sentence
sure but the death routine only handles 1 or 2 16x16 tiles
depending on yet another tweaker bit
@thebiob I wish I understood what your talking about it sounds so cool lol
i was looking into why you can bounce off the banzai bill on the frame it despawns
okay but the names were made up by people not fully understanding the code
it's unfortunate that it stuck like that but you can't really blame the original names
i absolutely agree that the names are awful
just come up with new names and use those.
that's a name that is objectively correct but also useless
@TheBiob that's slightly better than "sprite table column 8 in my lua script".
i think it's quite a lot better than that lol
no i was referring to what dacin said
i don't because i have no clue what column order you have set up
sure but you can look that up, i can't look up what dacin's 8th column is
if you ever decide to call the highest bit bit 0 i will objectively disagree with you
oh you mean whether or not you start counting at 1 or 0?
if you ever decide to count bits starting at 1 i will objectively disagree with you
yes, I have not ever heard anyone use it another way without being called out for it
I would be naturial for 2^i to have the i-th bit set.
welcome to the koopa lottery, are you feeling lucky today?
you don't know what you've got til it's gone
I can't wait for RTA players to get screwed by sprite slots here.
Wow, I've never seen a version of this glitch where the lightning doesn't fall through katunS
that's not what I was expecting
oh, so that's what's supposed to happen here
so you don't need a flame in slot 0 to ride itself.
so that's why they're called buzzy
GG, thx for the stream katunLeave
